description: The PAT_ENC_HSP_2 table is the subsequent table for the PAT_ENC_HSP table, which is the primary table for hospital encounter information. Each record in this table is based on a patient contact serial number.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EX_DIS_DT_ENTR_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of entry of expected discharge date.

columns.name: EX_DIS_TM_ENTR_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of entry of expected discharge time.

columns.name: CONTRACT_REG_FLAG
columns.description: Indicates whether an HOV contact was registered using the Contract Registration workflow. If this workflow was not used, this column is null.

columns.name: CONTRACT_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The contract code category for the encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACCEPTS_BLOOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID that indicates whether this patient accepts blood. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ED_ARRIVAL_DETAILS
columns.description: Free text information holding any details regarding the ED Arrival.

columns.name: CONS_SEDATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the conscious sedation status for the patient encounter. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: RESTRAINT_SECLUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The restraint or seclusion status category ID for this patient encounter. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: MULTI_PREG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the mother has a multiple pregnancy for this L&D encounter. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DISASTER_NUM
columns.description: This column stores the disaster number, which is a number given by the ambulance company to patients during catastrophes that cause massive patient influxes to the hospital.

columns.name: SRC_PATTERN_CSN_ID
columns.description: The Contact Serial Number (CSN) of the Admission Pattern record associated with the projected bed usage for this patient encounter. If this projection is manually modified an end user, the column stores null.

columns.name: ENC_CLOSED_OR_COMPLETED_DATE
columns.description: The date that the encounter was closed or completed.

columns.name: ED_DISPO_PAT_COND_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the patient condition at time of disposition in the ED. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Good


Stable


Fair


Serious


Critical


Expired

columns.name: ADOPTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Item to store what type of adoption is related to the current L&D contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Open Adoption


Closed Adoption


Surrogate


Safe Surrender


Gestational Carrier


Hide Mother's Info


Not Applicable

columns.name: PRI_PROBLEM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the principal problem for a patient's hospitalization.

columns.name: EXPECTED_DISCHRG_APPROX_TIME_C_NAME
columns.description:
Current approximate expected discharge time.  Each value represents a time range (e.g. Morning, Midday, Afternoon, Evening).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Morning


Midday


Afternoon


Evening

columns.name: DISCH_MILEST_KICKOFF_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Displays the date and time that discharge milestones were initiated.

columns.name: DISCH_MILEST_AUTO_MANAGED_YN
columns.description:
Determines if discharge milestones have had any manual intervention.  Discharge Milestones are considered auto-managed if the discharge order is the sole driver for kicking off and discontinuing milestones.  


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MULTI_PREG_YN

columns.name: PREDICTED_LOS
columns.description: The Length of Stay value determined by the Predictive Model run.

columns.name: EXP_LOS_UPD_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source (e.g. Predictive Model, User Entered) from which the Expected Length of Stay was updated.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


User Entered


Model Prediction


Expected Discharge Date Update


Expected Length of Stay Update


Admission Planning Reservation Updated


Discharge Order Filed

columns.name: ED_ENC_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores how an ED encounter was created (e.g. via interface, user workflows)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Standard


Interface


Kiosk


Online


Call Center / Clinic Referral


Scheduling

columns.name: ED_DEPART_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The ED Departure date and time in UTC.

columns.name: ADT_ARRIVAL_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The arrival date and time in UTC.

columns.name: HOSP_DISCH_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The hospital discharge date and time in UTC.

columns.name: HOSP_ADMSN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The hospital admission date and time in UTC.

columns.name: INP_ADMSN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the patient first reached a patient class of Inpatient in UTC.

columns.name: ED_HISTORICAL_YN
columns.description:
ED Historical Encounter is set by cutover and historical encounter interfaces when patient encounters are created for emergency patients.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PATIENT_TASK_COMPLETION_RATE
columns.description: Aggregated task progression rates across all active tasks currently assigned to the patient.

columns.name: START_MED_REM_DISCHG_YN
columns.description:
If set to 1-Yes, medication reminders will start automatically after discharge. If set to 0-No or empty, medication reminders will not start automatically after discharge.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MULTI_PREG_YN

columns.name: EXPECTED_DISCHARGE_UNKNOWN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the expected discharge date is unknown for this patient. 'Y' indicates that the expected discharge date is unknown and documented. 'N' indicates that the expected discharge date is known and documented. NULL indicates that no expected discharge info has been saved for this contact.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MULTI_PREG_YN

columns.name: DUAL_ADMISSION_CSN
columns.description: In a dual admission scenario this will point from the encounter on leave to the admitted encounter.

columns.name: LOA_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This column is only populated when the encounter for this row is admitted and the patient currently has an encounter on a leave of absence. This column displays the unique contact serial number of the patient encounter that is on a leave of absence.

columns.name: INITIAL_ADT_PAT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The ADT type of encounter category ID initially assigned for the encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Preadmission


Admission


Discharged


Leave of Absence


Hospital Outpatient Visit

columns.name: NOTIFICATION_SENT_FIRST_IP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the Event Notification message was sent when the patient was upgraded to an IP class. 'Y' indicates that the message was sent. 'N' or NULL indicate that the message was not sent. Note that this message is only sent once, even though the date and time the patient became IP can be changed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MULTI_PREG_YN

columns.name: NOTIFICATION_SENT_OBS_ADMSN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the Event Notification message was sent when the patient was upgraded to an observation patient class. 'Y' indicates that the message was sent. 'N' or NULL indicate that the message was not sent. Note that this message is only sent once, even though the date and time the patient became observation can be changed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MULTI_PREG_YN

columns.name: IB_ALERT_LENGTH_OF_STAY_MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the In Basket Message that was sent to alert that a patient has gone past the approved length of stay.

columns.name: INITIAL_ADMIT_CONF_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The encounter status category ID initially assigned to this encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Confirmed


Pending


Canceled


Completed

columns.name: TRANSFER_COMMENTS
columns.description: The transfer comments entered by the user during the most recent transfer.
